CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "The Courier Home Service Fair at Hunt Armory can be described with one word, "terrific." This panorama of colorful displays, huge crowds, fabulous exhibits and excellent demonstrations is told here in pictures."
TitMainTitle: Two people in plaid elephant costumes for Top Value Stamp Co., kneeling with four children, including Sharon Goode Ryan, on left, at Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Costumes--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Children--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
